Entries.give_flowersA: This is so sweet of you.$4
Entries.give_flowersB: But I have nothing to give you!$4
Entries.reject_two_heartA: It's a bit soon, isn't it?$3
Entries.reject_four_heartA: I'm not ready for that... Can't we stay friends?$3

Entries.engageB: Wait, what? Aren't you engaged already?$5

Entries.marriedB: I can't believe this! You're already married!$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsA: Oh no, we're just not close enough.$3
Entries.refusal_no_heartsB: I'm sorry, I don't know you very well.$3
Entries.refusal_knownA: I'm flattered, but I don't think so.$3
